rules_text:
When Flourishing Flock enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Flourishing Flock and exile it with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3–{1}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
